name: worldwide
description: Get quizzed about any country in the world!

name: europe
description: Dive into Europe's rich history and diverse cultures, from the charming streets of Paris to the ancient ruins of Rome.

name: asia
description: Explore the vibrant countries of Asia, where bustling cities and serene landscapes collide in a whirlwind of experiences.

name: north_america
description: Discover the diverse landscapes of North America, from the towering peaks of the Rockies to the bustling streets of New York City.

name: south_america
description: Immerse yourself in the lively rhythms of South America, where vibrant cities and stunning natural wonders await at every turn.

name: hardest
description: Get quizzed only about the countries the community knows the less!

name: easiest
description: Get quizzed only about the countries the community knows the most!
